authorizationServerUrl.title: Authorization server URL
authorizationServerUrl.description: URL of the authorization server. Supports EL

introspectionEndpoint.title: Token introspection endpoint
introspectionEndpoint.description: Path which is used to introspect an incoming access token (must start with '/'). Supports EL

introspectionEndpointMethod.title: Token introspection method
introspectionEndpointMethod.description: HTTP method used to introspect the access token.

scopeSeparator.title: Scope separator
scopeSeparator.description: Separator used to separate scopes for token introspection (default is a whitespace)

userInfoEndpoint.title: Userinfo endpoint
userInfoEndpoint.description: Path which is used to get userinfo using incoming access token (must start with '/'). Supports EL

userInfoEndpointMethod.title: Userinfo  method
userInfoEndpointMethod.description: HTTP method used to get userinfo.

clientId.title: Client Id
clientId.description: The client identifier used for token introspection. (Supports EL and secrets)

clientSecret.title: Client Secret
clientSecret.description: The client secret used for token introspection. (Supports EL and secrets)

useClientAuthorizationHeader.title: Use HTTP header for client authorization
useClientAuthorizationHeader.description: To prevent token scanning attacks, the endpoint MUST also require some form of authorization to access this endpoint. In this case we are using an HTTP header for client authentication.

tokenIsSuppliedByQueryParam.title: Use a query parameter to supply access token
tokenIsSuppliedByQueryParam.description: Access token is passed to the introspection endpoint using a query parameter.

tokenQueryParamName.title: Token query param name
tokenQueryParamName.description: Query parameter used to supply access token. Supports EL

tokenIsSuppliedByHttpHeader.title: Use an HTTP header to supply access token
tokenIsSuppliedByHttpHeader.description: Access token is passed to the introspection endpoint using an HTTP header.

tokenHeaderName.title: HTTP header name
tokenHeaderName.description: HTTP header used to supply access token. Supports EL

tokenIsSuppliedByFormUrlEncoded.title: Use application/x-www-form-urlencoded form to send access token
tokenIsSuppliedByFormUrlEncoded.description: Send access token in application/x-www-form-urlencoded form.

tokenFormUrlEncodedName.title: Form param name
tokenFormUrlEncodedName.description: Name of the form param in case of application/x-www-form-urlencoded. Supports EL

userClaim.title: User claim
userClaim.description: User claim field used to store end user on log analytics. Supports EL

idleTimeout.title: Idle timeout (ms)
idleTimeout.description: Maximum time in milliseconds a connection will be opened if no data is received nor sent. Once the timeout has elapsed, the unused connection will be closed, allowing to free the associated resources.

connectTimeout.title: Connect Timeout (ms)
connectTimeout.description: Maximum time to connect to the backend in milliseconds.

keepAliveTimeout.title: Keep-alive timeout (ms)
keepAliveTimeout.description: Maximum time a connection will remain unused in the pool in milliseconds. Once the timeout has elapsed, the unused connection will be evicted.
